fields.title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
fields.description: A creamy and delicious pasta dish from Italy.
fields.ingredients:
Spaghetti
 Eggs
 Parmesan cheese
 Pancetta
 Black pepper
fields.steps:
Boil pasta.
  Cook pancetta until crispy.
  Mix eggs with Parmesan.
  Combine and serve.

fields.title: Chicken Tikka Masala
fields.description: A popular Indian curry dish with grilled marinated chicken.
fields.ingredients:
Chicken
 Yogurt
 Garlic
 Ginger
 Spices
 Tomatoes
 Cream
fields.steps:
Marinate chicken.
  Grill until charred.
  Prepare sauce.
  Simmer chicken in sauce and serve.

fields.title: Beef Stroganoff
fields.description: A classic Russian dish with tender beef strips and a creamy mushroom sauce.
fields.ingredients:
Beef
 Mushrooms
 Onion
 Garlic
 Sour cream
 Beef broth
fields.steps:
Sear beef strips.
  Sauté mushrooms and onions.
  Add beef broth and reduce.
  Stir in sour cream and serve over noodles.

fields.title: Avocado Toast with Poached Egg
fields.description: A quick and nutritious breakfast option with creamy avocado and a perfectly poached egg.
fields.ingredients:
Bread
 Avocado
 Egg
 Salt
 Pepper
 Lemon juice
fields.steps:
Toast bread.
  Mash avocado with salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
  Spread avocado on toast.
  Top with a poached egg.

fields.title: French Onion Soup
fields.description: A comforting French soup with caramelized onions, beef broth, and melted cheese.
fields.ingredients:
Onions
 Butter
 Beef broth
 French bread
 Gruyere cheese
fields.steps:
Caramelize onions in butter.
  Add beef broth and simmer.
  Pour soup into bowls.
  Top with bread and cheese, broil until melted.

fields.title: Sushi Rolls
fields.description: Homemade sushi rolls with fresh ingredients and customizable fillings.
fields.ingredients:
Sushi rice
 Nori sheets
 Cucumber
 Avocado
 Salmon
 Soy sauce
fields.steps:
Prepare sushi rice.
  Place rice on nori.
  Add fillings and roll.
  Slice and serve with soy sauce.

fields.title: Tacos al Pastor
fields.description: Traditional Mexican tacos with marinated pork and pineapple.
fields.ingredients:
Pork
 Pineapple
 Onion
 Cilantro
 Corn tortillas
 Lime
fields.steps:
Marinate pork with spices.
 Grill with pineapple.
 Slice and serve on tortillas with toppings.

fields.title: Mushroom Risotto
fields.description: A creamy Italian rice dish made with mushrooms and Parmesan cheese.
fields.ingredients:
Arborio rice
 Mushrooms
 Onion
 Garlic
 Parmesan
 White wine
fields.steps:
Sauté onions and mushrooms.
  Add rice and wine.
  Gradually add broth, stirring until creamy.
  Stir in Parmesan and serve.

fields.title: Chicken Enchiladas
fields.description: A cheesy and spicy Mexican dish with tortillas filled with seasoned chicken.
fields.ingredients:
Chicken breast
 Tortillas
 Cheese
 Enchilada sauce
 Onions
 Sour cream
fields.steps:
Cook and shred chicken.
 Fill tortillas with chicken and cheese.
 Roll and place in baking dish.
 Cover with sauce and bake.
 Serve with sour cream.

fields.title: Miso Soup
fields.description: A light and umami-rich Japanese soup made with miso paste and tofu.
fields.ingredients:
Miso paste
 Dashi stock
 Tofu
 Green onions
 Seaweed
fields.steps:
Heat dashi stock.
 Add miso paste and stir.
 Add tofu and seaweed.
 Garnish with green onions and serve.

fields.title: Classic Pancakes
fields.description: Fluffy homemade pancakes, perfect for breakfast with syrup and butter.
fields.ingredients:
Flour
 Eggs
 Milk
 Sugar
 Baking powder
 Butter
 Vanilla extract
fields.steps:
Mix dry and wet ingredients.
 Heat skillet and pour batter.
 Flip pancakes when bubbles form.
 Serve with butter and syrup.

fields.title: Borscht
fields.description: A classic Russian beet soup served hot or cold, often topped with sour cream.
fields.ingredients:
Beets
 Cabbage
 Carrots
 Potatoes
 Onion
 Garlic
 Beef broth
 Sour cream
fields.steps:
Chop vegetables.
 Sauté onions and garlic.
 Add beets, broth, and simmer.
 Garnish with sour cream and serve.

fields.title: Classic Cheeseburger
fields.description: A juicy and flavorful burger with melted cheese and fresh toppings.
fields.ingredients:
Ground beef
 Burger buns
 Cheese
 Lettuce
 Tomato
 Onion
 Pickles
 Ketchup
 Mustard
fields.steps:
Form beef patties.
 Grill until cooked through.
 Add cheese and let it melt.
 Assemble with toppings on a bun.
 Serve with fries.
